trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There was one other sighting in San Diego on or around November 1st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details11\01\2010 approximately 2:00 p.m. my friend and i were outside talking on separate phone calls when my friend pointed out a "daytime star". being 2:00 approximately i found it odd. we had seen a similar thing a few months ago and we got a very rudimentary telescope which, when focused on the stationary object in the sky, turned out to be 3 spheres. this time we brought out the big telescope. when we finally found the object and this time it was actually moving at a quick clip. although moving we were able to track it and because of the better equipment were able to see that it was a red sphere with two white spheres going around it. shortly thereafter it was out of our sight.
Summary: 3 X SPHERES IN UPPER ATMOSPHERE: CENTER SPHERE RED IN COLOR; TWO OUTSIDE SPHERES WHITE IN COLOR.
